name: Gates Of a Ruined Empire
description:
What is this game about?

Discover the history of the fall of the Empire, which thanks to technological supremacy have grown for hundreds of years, imposing conquered nations their laws, ideas and religion, while brutally suppressing all forms of resistance. See what happens to society when all dogmas turn out to be fiction.

Let's play some Real Time Strategy!

  • Enjoy the multiplicity of configurations in a complex combat system, allowing you to adapt the weaponry and specialization of your units.
  • Focus on strategy and tactics instead of rage clicking and memorizing keyboard macros.
  • Accept the fact that dice rollovers are cool, and everything that is based on static data is boring.

More information soon.

Add us to your wishlist and wait for news about project development and upcoming demo version.
The work is in progress, so keep an eye on us.
